name: Control Panic
description:
You will loose these controls as you are being hit by enemies, You will gain controls as you destroy more enemeies!

UNLOCK THE CONTROL K TO WIN THE GAME!!! (then press it and walk through the portal)

ASD - for Movement

W - for Jumping

S - Ground pound if used mid-air

Mouse - for Aim/Shooting 

H - for Another Jump

J - for Dashing

K - for Winning the game! 

Full Credits:
